integration_id.description: ID of the voice integration that managed the voice call.

ticket_id.description: ID of the ticket the voice call belongs to.

phone_number_id.description: ID of the phone number that received or performed the voice call.

external_id.description: ID of the voice call on the provider side (Twilio, etc...).

provider.description: The voice solutions provider handling the voice call. It provides the external_id.

status.description: The current status of the voice call.

direction.description: Whether the voice call is received from a customer (inbound) or addressed to a customer (outbound).

phone_number_source.description: The phone number performing the voice call.

country_source.description: The country code of the phone number performing the voice call.

phone_number_destination.description: The phone number receiving the voice call.

country_destination.description: The country code of the phone number receiving the voice call.

duration.description: Duration in seconds of the voice call.

started_datetime.description: When the voice call started on the provider side.

created_datetime.description: When the voice call was created in Gorgias.

updated_datetime.description: When the voice call was last updated.

initiated_by_agent_id.description: The agent that initiated the voice call, only for outbound calls.

last_answered_by_agent_id.description: The last agent that answered the voice call, only for inbound calls.

customer_id.description: For inbound calls, the customer that initiated the voice call. For outbound calls, the customer that received the voice call.

has_voicemail.description: Whether the voice call has a voicemail attached.

has_call_recording.description: Whether the voice call has a call recording attached.
